tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE trend_analysis (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  metric_id INT NOT NULL,
  trend_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  trend_description TEXT,
  analysis_date DATE NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (metric_id) REFERENCES risk_metrics(id)
);

CREATE TABLE RiskMetricsHistory (
    history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    metric_id INT,
    old_value DECIMAL(10,2),
    new_value DECIMAL(10,2),
    change_reason TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE metric_categories (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    metric_id INT NOT NULL,
    category_id INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (metric_id) REFERENCES risk_metrics(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (category_id) REFERENCES risk_categories(category_id)
);

CREATE TABLE trend_analysis (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    metric_id INT NOT NULL,
    trend_date DATE NOT NULL,
    trend_value FLOAT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (metric_id) REFERENCES risk_metrics(id)
);
CREATE TABLE RiskMetrics ( id INT, metric_name VARCHAR(50), metric_value FLOAT, date DATE );
CREATE TABLE MetricTrends ( id INT, trend_name VARCHAR(50), start_date DATE, end_date DATE );
CREATE TABLE RiskFactors ( id INT, risk_factor_name VARCHAR(50), description TEXT, weight FLOAT );
CREATE TABLE RiskAssessment ( id INT, assessment_name VARCHAR(50), assessed_date DATE, risk_score FLOAT );
CREATE TABLE RiskHistory ( id INT, risk_id INT, timestamp TIMESTAMP, action VARCHAR(50) );
